attributes.title: my family almost burned
attributes.review: got the app and it was was slow so when i connected it to my tv the tv started burning and  burned the whole block down. this makes me not want to vote for trump.

attributes.title: Everyone is orange
attributes.review: Somehow it glitched so I couldn’t tell who was my savior and idol (President Trump) and who was someone else :( had to uninstall 😔

attributes.title: i hate it
